label: attachedTransportEquipment
comment: A piece of logistics transport equipment attached to this logistics means of transport.
Transport equipment attached to this piece of logistics transport equipment, such as ropes or refrigeration units.

rangeIncludes.comment: A piece of attached transport equipment, such as a chain or a tarpaulin.

domainIncludes.comment: The device or method used to convey people, goods, animals or other objects from place to place.
